channel.title: Need help! Disconnect when login! [317]
channel.description:
Okay so i downloaded [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,421856.msg3097442.html#msg3097442]this client[/url].
Its an edited client of Galkons Refactored Client, anyways when i load the client it just loads but when i log in my name turns in to this Ahdltiv8evps. And then i disconnect.
Btw im using delta base.
My run.bat file from the client says this : [img]http://img229.imageshack.us/img229/2856/clientsays.png[/img]
And my run.bat from the source says this : [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/858/runsays.png[/img]
So, does anyone knows how to fix this? Or knows whats the problem?
Thanks anyways, for reading and for helping(maybe).

item.title: Need help! Disconnect when login! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Lost_Valentino Lost Valentino
item.description:
@Lost_Valentino wrote:

only thing im gonna say is: dan -.- you need to make it connect to your server?( make it work with your server)

Read full topic
